head.title: Food Service - Weyauwega-Fremont School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.div:
410 E Ann St, Weyauwega, WI 54983
Phone 920-867-8800 | Fax 920-867-8815

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Weyauwega-Fremont School District » Families » Food Service

div.div:
Free Meals Sign-Up Free meals sign-up: call 920-867-8921 or email cbillington@wfsd.k12.wi.us
The district is offering free breakfast and lunch for all of your children (up to age 18 or 21 if still attending school) on school days starting on March 23rd.
If absolutely necessary, the district can deliver to a home address. But otherwise we would prefer you to pick up at one of the four (4) pick-up locations listed below during the time indicated. You may need to coordinate a pick-up location with your child's sitter if necessary.
Breakfast will consist of a cereal "kit" w/ milk, fruit, and a snack. Lunch will consist of a cold sandwich, fruit, veggie, chips/crackers, and milk/juice.
Pick-up locations:
1) Hahn-a-Lula Resort, 8861 S Wolf River Rd (11:40-12:00)
2) Christ Lutheran Church, N6404 State Rd. 49 (11:10-11:30)
3) Fremont School, 615 Wolf River Dr (11:00-12:00)
4) Weyauwega-Fremont High School, Door 10A (in back of building), 500 E Ann St. (11:00-12:00)
FREE/REDUCED
MEAL APPLICATIONS:
Applications for Free or Reduced Meals are located at all school sites in the main offices. A form can also be filled out online via Skyward Family Access.
To print out a free/reduced application go to DPI website. In the search field, type free and reduced application.

div.p: Payments may be made by using efunds, sending check, money order, or cash with your student. You may also mail checks or money orders to Attention of Food Service Department, School District of Weyauwega-Fremont, P.O. Box 580, Weyauwega, WI 54983-0580.
